name: Tetra Defense
description:
What if Tetris Was a shooter?

well pretty bad because this is a Ludum Dare game but the idea's still there shoot those soldiers to protect the base while maneuvering pieces into position or just use them to block or squish the enemy.

Controls And Other important information:

the machine gun is op its there in case you want skip to the end quickly if you want to play it properly don't use it.

The Game Isn't Very Well Balanced Due To Time Constraints!

shooting is done with the mouse and moving blocks with W, A, S and D but all the controls can be changed in the input menu just before you start the game

holding shift while upgrading your troops will buy multiple upgrades

creating Tetris rows will reinforce a barricade in front of your base

and also you can end the game at any time by pressing escape (Warning this will end your game immediately)
